title: Uncover the Gender Gap in Education
core_lesson: Creating differences in gender education levels in different countries. This task trains the univariate reading skills, help to distinguish patterns in education data.

title: Sales Anomaly Detection by Season
core_lesson: Interpreting consumer behavior through temporal trends and seasonality. This task builds the ability to read and interpret time-series data, a critical skill for any data analyst.

title: Segmenting Customers (Mall Dataset)
core_lesson: Customer Segmentation Using Clustering. This task trains the multivariate reading skills, help to distinguish patterns in customer behavior based on demographics and spending.

title: Diagnosing & Dealing with Missing Data
core_lesson: Missing Data Analysis & Imputation Techniques. This is a critical skill for any analyst, as real-world data is often incomplete.

title: Spotting Outliers in Transactions
core_lesson: Outlier Detection and Impact Assessment in Financial Data. This is a critical skill for fraud detection, risk management, and data quality assurance.

title: What’s Correlated in Student Performance?
core_lesson: Correlation Analysis & Heatmap Interpretation. This builds the ability to spot hidden relationships in high-dimensional data — a must-have for modeling and insight storytelling.

title: Monthly Retention from Signup Cohorts
core_lesson: Cohort Analysis: Tracking Group Behavior Over Time. This is how analysts understand retention, churn, and long-term engagement.

title: Delivery Performance by City
core_lesson: Geo-Spatial Analysis — an essential data skill for understanding location-driven behavior, reach, and performance.

title: Decomposing Daily Website Traffic
core_lesson: Time-Series Decomposition — Trend, Seasonality & Noise. This is key for analyzing sales, demand, web traffic, stock prices, and more.

title: Keyword Frequency in Product Reviews
core_lesson: Natural Language Processing (NLP) challenge — not with complex modeling, but through data reading and visual interpretation of text patterns.

title: RFM Segmentation for Customer Value Targeting
core_lesson: Segmenting customers based on Recency, Frequency, and Monetary value (RFM) to identify lifecycle stages.

title: Modeling Customer Time-to-Churn with Survival Analysis
core_lesson: Using survival analysis to model time until an event (like churn or dropout) and understand influencing factors.

title: Anomaly Detection in Sensor Readings
core_lesson: Detecting anomalies in numerical time-series data using statistical thresholds and visual analysis.

title: Visualize Customer Segments Using t-SNE
core_lesson: Using t-SNE to reduce high-dimensional data into 2D space and visually identify clusters or hidden patterns.

title: Feature Engineering for Product Return Prediction
core_lesson: Enhancing datasets using feature engineering to extract more predictive power from raw variables.

title: Sales Performance Dashboard
core_lesson: Designing decision dashboards using aggregated metrics and intuitive visualizations for fast insight delivery.

title: Was the New Checkout Page Better?
core_lesson: Evaluating A/B test results using statistical testing to determine if differences are significant.

title: Does Ad Budget Increase Sales?
core_lesson: Distinguishing correlation from causation using statistical controls and visual exploration in observational data.

title: Clean & Merge E-Commerce Data
core_lesson: Merging, cleaning, and enriching messy data from multiple sources to prepare analysis-ready datasets.

title: Forecast Monthly Sales
core_lesson: Forecasting future trends using moving averages and exponential smoothing on time series data.

title: Pitch a Data Product Idea
core_lesson: Designing a real-world data product using creative insight, analytical logic, and business framing.

title: Analyzing Product Launch Success
core_lesson: Using post-launch analytics to track product performance and recommend data-driven improvements.

title: Churn Whisperer: Uncovering Why Users Leave
core_lesson: Churn Analysis — identifying subtle patterns in user behavior that predict product abandonment.

title: The A/B Trap: When 'Better' Isn’t Actually Better
core_lesson: A/B Testing Analysis & Statistical Inference — looking beyond just mean differences to make data-backed product decisions.

title: The Price is (Not Always) Right
core_lesson: Price Elasticity Analysis — how user adoption and revenue respond to different price points.

title: Map the Money: Regional Performance Audit
core_lesson: Geographic Data Analysis — identify which regions are driving business success (or dragging it down).

title: Segment to Survive: Target the Right Users
core_lesson: Customer Segmentation & Behavioral Profiling — identify meaningful user groups that should receive personalized marketing.

title: Voices & Numbers: A Mixed-Methods Deep Dive
core_lesson: Quantitative + Qualitative Analysis — using both user behavior and feedback to diagnose issues and propose solutions.

title: Before It Breaks: Early Signal Detection
core_lesson: Time Series Trend Analysis + Metric Monitoring — track product health metrics and detect subtle behavior shifts.

title: The Hero Metric: Tell the Story Behind the Numbers
core_lesson: Data Storytelling + Synthesis — Build an end-to-end narrative that answers one big question using real data and sharp reasoning.
